english.segment1: Never got anywhere. By running away. Never learned anything. Without anything. Without a mistake
english.segment2: Never loved anyone. By playing it safe. It's a long way, but. I'm right here now, so
english.segment3: Here goes nothing. Here goes everything. Gotta reach for something. Or you'll fall for anything
english.segment4: Take a breath, take a step. What comes next. God only knows. But here goes
english.segment5: I don't wanna turn around. And wonder what happened. Never lost and never found. Are one and the same
english.segment6: I wanna run across the battle lines. And take my chances. Not the long way 'round. When I'm here right now
english.segment7: Here goes nothing. Here goes everything. Gotta reach for something. Or you'll fall for anything
english.segment8: Take a breath, take a step. What comes next. God only knows. But here goes
english.segment9: What good is chance not taken?. What good is life not living?. What good is love not given?
english.segment10: Here goes nothing. Here goes everything. Gotta reach for something. Or you'll fall for anything
english.segment11: Here goes nothing. Here goes everything. Gotta reach for something. Or you'll fall for anything
english.segment12: Take a breath, take a step. What comes next. God only knows. But here goes. And God only knows. But here goes
